toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, future amortization will be cancelled & bypassed in amortization processing. It's assumed that unprocessed amounts will be manually adjusted in the financial system. The cancellation process can be reversed so could be used a temporary hold.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Amortization Cancelled
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_cancelled__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The default COGS Account for the given Product being amortized. This is the Sub Ledger Account (aka Mfg Account) to be debited when this SO Line Amortization Schedule is processed (adjusting the amount in the Deferred COGS Account).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: COGS Account
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_cogsacct__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soamort__c.rstk__soamort_cogsacct__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>The default COGS Account for the given Product being amortized. This is the Sub Ledger Account (aka Mfg Account) to be debited when this SO Line Amortization Schedule is processed (adjusting the amount in the Deferred COGS Account).</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>COGS Account</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syacc__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Sales Order Line Amortization Schedules (COGS Account)</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>soamorts2</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The value of the amount transferred from the Shipping Clearing Account and COGS (the value of what has "shipped").
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Total COGS Amount
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_cogsamt__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: If desired, the scheduled Cost of Goods Sold Amount for the next transfer can be overridden to the amount in this field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Override COGS Amount for Next Transfer
toolingEntityParticle.MasterLabel: Override COGS Amount for Next Transfer
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_cogsamtovr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field shows the Amount Remaining of Cost of Goods Sold in the Amortization Schedule.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: COGS Amount Remaining
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_cogsamtrmng__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soamort__c.rstk__soamort_cogsamtrmng__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>ROUND(rstk__soamort_cogsamt__c - rstk__soamort_cogsamtxfer__c,2)</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>This field shows the Amount Remaining of Cost of Goods Sold in the Amortization Schedule.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>COGS Amount Remaining</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>18</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>2</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Number</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: User-defined comment for the next transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Comment for Next Transaction
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_comment__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that the given sale has been fully amortized.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Amortization Completed
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_completed__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soamort__c.rstk__soamort_completed__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>IF(rstk__soamort_cogsamtxfer__c = rstk__soamort_cogsamt__c , IF(rstk__soamort_salesamtxfer__c = rstk__soamort_salesamt__c, true,false) , false)</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>When checked, indicates that the given sale has been fully amortized.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Amortization Completed</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Checkbox</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soamort__c.rstk__soamort_div__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Applicable DIvision</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Division</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__sydiv__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Sales Order Line Amortization Schedules</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>soamorts</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The last month of amortization where the sale is fully amortized, based on ‘Current Number of Months Remaining’.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Planned Ending Month
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_endmonth__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The year associated with the ‘Planned Ending Month’.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Planned Ending Year
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_endyear__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The last month in which prior amortization has occurred.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Last Processed Month
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_lastmonth__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Last Period Processed
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_lastperiod__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soamort__c.rstk__soamort_lastperiod__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>IF(rstk__soamort_lastmonth__c < 10, TEXT(rstk__soamort_lastyear__c)+'0'+TEXT(rstk__soamort_lastmonth__c), TEXT(rstk__soamort_lastyear__c)+TEXT(rstk__soamort_lastmonth__c))</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Last Period Processed</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The year associated with the ‘Last Processed Month’.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Last Processed Year
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_lastyear__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number of months over which amortization of this sale has already been amortized.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Number of Months Amortized
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_monthsdone__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number of months remaining for the sale to be fully amortized. If desired, amortization can be accelerated or slowed by changing this value.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Current Number of Months Remaining
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_monthsleft__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The quantity "packed" (when using Pick/Pack/Ship.for fulfillments) or shipped (when using Consolidated fulfillment). This quantity is the basis for calculating the amortization amount.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Quantity Sold
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_qty__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The default Sales (Revenue) Account for the given Product being amortized. This is the Sub Ledger Account (aka Mfg Account) to be credited when this SO Line Amortization Schedule is processed (adjusting the amount in the Deferred Sales Account).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sales Account
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_salesacct__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soamort__c.rstk__soamort_salesacct__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>The default Sales (Revenue) Account for the given Product being amortized. This is the Sub Ledger Account (aka Mfg Account) to be credited when this SO Line Amortization Schedule is processed (adjusting the amount in the Deferred Sales Account).</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Sales Account</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syacc__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Sales Order Line Amortization Schedules (Sales Account)</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>soamorts</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The total value of the Shipper Line, which is calculated as the 'Quantity Sold' (packaged and/or shipped) times the SO Line price.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Total Sales Amount
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_salesamt__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: If desired, the scheduled Sales Amount for the next transfer can be overridden to the amount in this field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Override Sales Amount for Next Transfer
toolingEntityParticle.MasterLabel: Override Sales Amount for Next Transfer
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_salesamtovr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The difference between the 'Total Amount Sold' and the 'Sales Amount Transferred', representing the amount remaining to be amortized.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sales Amount Remaining
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_salesamtrmng__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The date that this shipment was packaged (Pick/Pack/Ship fulfillment) or shipped (Consolidated fulfillment).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Shipment Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_shipdate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The first month that amortization will begin.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Starting Month
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_startmonth__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Starting Period
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_startperiod__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The year associated with the ‘Starting Month'.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Starting Year
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_startyear__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number of months over which the given sale will be amortized. When using Contracts, this value is defaulted to the Contract Term (in months). When not using Contracts, this value needs to be manually set.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Planned Total Months
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_totmonths__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The “unit” cost value of the given sale, which is the ‘Total COGS Amount’ divided by the number of units shipped.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Per Unit COGS Amount
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_unitcogsamt__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The Unit Price of the given sale, which is the ‘Total Sales Amount’ divided by the number of units shipped.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Per Unit Sales Amount
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_unitsalesamt__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Not Applicable
toolingEntityParticle.Label: triggeroptions
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__triggeroptions__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field indicates the amortization amount from the Invoice Line was Negative. The amount has been set as positive, and the Debit and Credits will be reversed upon amortization.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: From Order Line Credit (Negative Value)
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soamort_negative__c
